thread.title: Cheryl 'moves into Liam Payne's pad as her due date approaches' | Metro News
thread.title_full: Cheryl 'moves into Liam Payne's pad as her due date approaches' | Metro News

author: Jessica Walford For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Cheryl 'moves into Liam Payne's pad as her due date approaches' | Metro News
text:
Jessica Walford for Metro.co.uk Sunday 26 Feb 2017 10:47 pm Is baby Chiam (finally) on their way? (Picture: Getty Images) 
Cheryl has reportedly moved into Liam Payne’s mansion in Surrey as her due date rapidly approaches. BBC's Nick Robinson posts emotional tribute to Radio 4 presenter Steve Hewlett 
The Girls Aloud singer has is said to have moved all her belongings from her home in Hertfordshire that she used to share with former husband, Jean-Bernard Fernandez-Versini. 
Family members of the Fight For This Love singer – including mum Joan Callaghan and brother Garry Tweedy – were spotted at the house which is now on the market, according to the Daily Star Sunday . 
And keen Cheryl fans could snap up the former love nest if they have a spare £18,746 per month. Cheryl debuted her bump in a new L’Oreal advert (Picture: PA) 
Just out of our price range, unfortunately. 
Cheryl, who recently showed off her growing baby bump in a new L’Oreal ad , plans to raise baby Chiam at the Surrey mansion – and has enlisted the help of her mum and Liam’s mum, Karen, to help raise the newborn. 
The 33-year-old is due to give birth ‘within weeks’ to her first child. Cheryl’s mum Joan is said to be moving in to help with the baby (Picture: Mark Robert Milan/GC Images) 
In fact, a source told Metro.co.uk that the baby could be here very very soon. 
They said: ‘Cheryl is getting very excited to meet her baby. Her due date was mid to late March but she knows there is a two week window on either side so her baby could literally be here any day now!’ More
